selectionObj.name: display a value in CSS log
selectionObj.desc: Displays a value in Control Surface Studio's log (Note: for this to function, ensure you have the 'log.txt location' setup correctly in Control Surface Studio's settings)

parameterObj.name: Value To Display
parameterObj.desc: The selected value will be displayed in Ableton Live's status bar

actions.full_code:
path = self.song().view.selected_track.view.selected_device.parameters[loop_number]
data = []
data.append(str(loop_number) + ". ")
data.append(str(path.name) )
data.append(" [ Min " + str(path.min) )
data.append(" | Max " + str(path.max) )
data.append(" | Current value " + str(path.value) + " ]")
joined = ''.join(data)

self.log_message("csslog: " + joined)

selectionObj.name: display a value in CSS log
selectionObj.desc: Displays a value in Control Surface Studio's log (Note: for this to function, ensure you have the 'log.txt location' setup correctly in Control Surface Studio's settings)

parameterObj.name: Value To Display
parameterObj.desc: The selected value will be displayed in Ableton Live's status bar

selectionObj.name: name
selectionObj.desc: The short parameter name as shown in the (closed) automation chooser.

name: selectCompressor

selectionObj.name: class name
selectionObj.desc: Live device type such as MidiChord, Operator, Limiter, MxDeviceAudioEffect, or PluginDevice.

selectionObj.name: modifiers - set the value of a modifier
selectionObj.desc: Set the value of a Modifier

parameterObj.name: Modifier
parameterObj.desc: The modifier that will be updated

parameterObj.name: Value To Set
parameterObj.desc: This will be set as the value of the modifier

selectionObj.name: loop - iteration number
selectionObj.desc: Returns the current loop number count (note: count starts from 0). Defaults to 0 if no loop is active

selectionObj.name: display a value in Live's status bar
selectionObj.desc: Displays a value in the status bar inside Ableton Live (This is found at the bottom of the screen in Live)

parameterObj.name: Value To Display
parameterObj.desc: The selected value will be displayed in Ableton Live's status bar
